name: Tenko's Magical Sword Quest
description:
Tenko's Magical Sword Quest is now on KickStarter! Support here: KickStarter
Join the community and discuss the game here on Discord



Tenko's Magical Sword Quest is a precision style platformer with an upbeat energetic vibe that will challenge anyone's gaming abilities. With suspenseful gameplay as you perform precise jumps, fast and timed movements will boosts your ability to win in style. Each level offers a challenging new experience, as Izzy the spaceship assistant automatically times and saves your new record. Your quest goes deep underground to master mysterious levels filled with photons, air activators, ghost floors, and magical stones.

Key Features:
  • Collect Photons to reach a super charged state, jump further and run faster.

  • See Tenko Third Person Style and experience a magical journey.
  • Enjoyable for all gamers, hardcore speed runners, and beginners.
  • 100 Levels with escalating difficulty.
  • Progress quickly with Checkpoints, saves your progress so you don't have to start over.

  • Feel Good retro style soundtrack.
  • Collect all magical stone pieces to craft Tenko's Legendary Sword
  • Teleporter beams you to a new level in the ultimate fashion.

  • Fly high with Air Activators , react fast with Ghost Floors and ride the Levitating Lifts.
  • Make new records with Izzy, automatically times and saves your new achievement.
  • Replay value: Replay the whole game in the ultimate challenge pro mode. Beat your original records and choose to use your new magical sword.



Tenko's Magical Sword Quest is to craft a magical sword from a stone piece he found as a young child. This stone raised Tenko's awareness that other stones like this one exist. Take Tenko on his journey to collect all the magical stone pieces. Will he come to realize along the way it's not the sword that makes the warrior or is the stone itself on a quest to find the one that can harness its true power?


  • Holding the X Gamepad Button Will boost Tenko"s speed and reach a super charged state. Jump further and run faster. (z key for keyboard)
  • Tap A Gamepad For short jump and hold for long jump. (spacebar for keyboard)d.
